message.content: Yes, the authors mention a new asset, the Colosseum Python package, and provide its project website URL: https://michelangeloconserva.github.io/Colosseum.
Yes, the authors introduce a new Python package called Colosseum and include the project website URL (https://michelangeloconserva.github.io/Colosseum) in the paper.

Yes, the authors mention the Colosseum Python package, which is available on the project website (https://michelangeloconserva.github.io/Colosseum) and provide additional details in the appendices of the paper.
